title: The Silent Secrets: The Arabella Academy Chronicles
description: There was a reason why Lily Smith was so quiet during her time at Arabella Academy. She was always taught not to draw attention to her family’s questionable ways of making ends meet. However, she can’t help asking her own questions when her best friend friend from high school falls prey to a ponzi scheme that she suspects her family may be involved in. Lily discovers an undercover cop in her family’s midst and must decide if he is her saving grace or her downfall.
author: Ashley Gallegos
